text.armorlayers.title: 3D Armor Layer Settings
text.armorlayers.renderdistancelod.toolt: The distance at which the model will switch to a lower level of detail(vanilla 2d)
text.armorlayers.basevoxelsize.tooltip: The size of the voxels used for armor
text.armorlayers.pantstorsosize.tooltip: The size of the voxels used for the chestplate area of pants
text.armorlayers.shoevoxelsize.tooltip: The size of the voxels used for shoes
text.armorlayers.headvoxelsize.tooltip: The size of the voxels used for the helmet
